ğŸš export PKG_CONFIG_PATH=/opt/lib/pkgconfig:/usr/lib/pkgconfig
ğŸš export CFLAGS=-I/opt/include 
ğŸš export LDFLAGS=-L/opt/lib 
ğŸš mktemp -d
ğŸš cd
ğŸš curl -fsSLO https://git.zx2c4.com/password-store/snapshot/password-store-1.7.4.tar.xz
ğŸš echo cfa9faf659f2ed6b38e7a7c3fb43e177d00edbacc6265e6e32215ff40e3793c0  password-store-1.7.4.tar.xz
ğŸš tee SHA256SUM
ğŸš cat SHA256SUM
ğŸš shasum -c SHA256SUM
ğŸš rm SHA256SUM
ğŸš tar -xf password-store-1.7.4.tar.xz
ğŸš cd password-store-1.7.4
ğŸš sudo make PREFIX=/opt/package/pass-1.7.4 WITH_ALLCOMP=yes install
ğŸš rm -rf
